name: Altruja
author: Altruja

sections.description: Altruja allows embedding simple, proven donation forms and fundraising tools to non-profits and political parties.
sections.installation:
1. Register for an account at https://www.altruja.de/register
  2. Install this plugin, and navigate to Settings -> Altruja in your WordPress backend
  3. Provide the email address you used to register to Altruja
  4. Login to https://www.altruja.de/myaltruja, navigate to “Pages” and then the page you would like to embed, click the donation button to the top right, and then click “Enable”. You can now collect donations.

1.0.0

short_description: Einfach. Online. Spenden sammeln. Altruja is a fast, simple and trustworthy way to collect donations online.
description: Altruja allows embedding simple, proven donation forms and fundraising tools to non-profits and political parties.
